sense.name: have a sudden sharp stinging pain
sense.examples: I winced as one of my broken teeth twinged. The telltale point in my lower back twinged. Every few seconds, my skull twinged from another " hit. " Montague felt a slight twinge of guilt as he recalled his brother's advice. I've a a twinge in my shoulder The bee twinged him untill he made him tear himself, and so mastered him. My knee twinges.

sense.name: squeeze tightly between fingers
sense.examples: How can you fawn upon a master that twinges by the ears? Twinge three or four buttons from off my lady's gown. But twinging him by the ears and nose.
